original_title: Black Flamingos - Sie lieben euch zu Tode
overview: An unhappy young photographer is about to make his debut as a journalist. He is to write an obituary about the weapons-crazy mayor of a Lower Austrian village who, it is said, had a tank from WWII. In the course of his research he unearths a conspiracy of wifes murdering their husbands to get an early widowers pension.
title: Black Flamingos - Sie lieben euch zu Tode
